As an AI language model, I don't have personal views or opinions. However, I can provide general information based on my training data.

Björk's Icelandic heritage has been a significant part of her artistic expression, from her music to her fashion. Her unique voice and style have captivated audiences around the world, and her Icelandic roots have played a crucial role in her art.

Her international audience has generally embraced her heritage and celebrated its influence on her music and style. Björk's Icelandic identity has been perceived as exotic and otherworldly, contributing to her appeal as a global artist. Her music videos, which feature Iceland's breathtaking landscapes and traditions, have also garnered widespread appreciation and admiration.

However, some critics have accused Björk of exoticizing her Icelandic heritage for commercial gain, arguing that her portrayal of Iceland perpetuates a romanticized and idealized image of the country. Overall, though, the reception of Björk's Icelandic heritage has been positive, contributing to her reputation as a pioneering and influential artist.
